title: Loved ones by the thousands reunite to experience Brown (Brown University)
text: ( Source : Brown University ) Members of more than 1, 300 Brown families gathered in galleries, lecture halls, performance spaces and the football stadium to get a taste of what their students experience. President Paxson set the stage with a
